page.title: 13SWIMMING POOL WORKINGTON
page.content: Next to the sports centre we have the swimming pool which were opened in 1971.These however were not the first baths the people of Workington had enjoyed there had previously been some public baths behind the site of the old Central Hotel.There are two pools at the complex a large 25m pool and a smaller heated pool for young children and non swimmers.From the baths they run a swimming team which competes throughout the county in competitions.The baths also have a drink and snack vending machine as well as a large spectator area by the larger of the two pools.
